result.reason: Allow users to explicitly configure Smart Size behavior for RDP connections with custom resolutions, instead of forcing it enabled.
result.approach: Add SmartSizeMode property to ConnectionInfo for RDP. Update RdpProtocol to respect this property when setting custom resolutions.

attempts.raw_output:

"decision": "implement",
"reason": "Allow users to explicitly configure Smart Size behavior for RDP connections with custom resolutions, instead of forcing it enabled.",

"approach": "Add SmartSizeMode property to ConnectionInfo for RDP. Update RdpProtocol to respect this property when setting custom resolutions."
